comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Bit of a guess (again!)...I wonder whether this might be the actress/singer Adele Crane...there are a few pics of her in the digitised newspapers which show a resemblance... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article129751681 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-page14776316 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-article130608937 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-article130601199 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-article130601980 If this is Adele Crane...she was quite a star on the Australian stage in the mid-later 1920s. She'd studied singing at the Melbourne Conservatorium, but evidently preferred popular theatre to the hi-brow stuff...she was married in 1929 and then went to live in the United States...where her life appears to have been not entirely happy (...feud with step-daughter...divorce...). She played a minor part in the movie Cavalcade (1933), but that might have been her only Hollywood role...I can't find a great deal of bio info on her...and no decent pics...I wonder if there's any footage of Cavalcade around the place which might feature her...work in progress...
